text: once in a village lived a poor farmer
with his family due to lack of rains no
harvest took place due to this there was
poverty everywhere many people went to
other villages in search of living but
this poor farmer didn't want to leave
the land where his ancestors lived but
his wife made him understand that she
and the two kids are dying out of hunger
and made him go in search of a job
keeping his family situation in mind he
started his journey towards the city on
his way he saw a big pit there was a man
a monkey a tiger and a snake inside it
they were trying very hard to come out
of it all the animals and the man said
sir please save me I'll do whatever I
can do in return of this favor and show
our gratitude the blue farmer felt sad
for them and thought what's wrong if I
help them what's the harm in it and
helped all the forth out of the pit and
continued on his journey though he
searched from dawn to dusk he couldn't
find a job for himself and thought of
returning back home when he crossed the
pit fern called somebody he looked
around to see who it was and saw the
monkey on the tree it had lot of grapes
in its hands the farmer was very hungry
the monkey understood this and said
looks like a varied diet here Happy's a
satisfy your hunger though he was very
hungry he hesitated for a while
please don't have a dick
think of me as your friend unaccepted
said the monkey he ate to his stomachs
firm and tight the monkey and left
please after a few minutes please come
my humble line
I can understand your poverty see I have
lot of gold and diamonds and pearls with
me take whatever is necessary for you
said the tiger since he couldn't refuse
he took few jewellery and left what do I
do with these jewelry - who shall I sell
it and make money thought the farmer he
immediately thought of a man he helped
out of the pit he directly went to him
and narrated the incident he was a
dweller by himself he understood that
the jewelry belonged to the royal family
immediately he thought that he would
trade his friend and get a good name of
the King and get lot of money please
wait I'll come in a minute said the man
and came back with the palace guards and
said this farmer is a thief the farmer
got punished and was pushed to jail the
farmer worried
the man did not even have the amount of
gratitude which the monkey and the tiger
had what world is this fine
the snake also told me that it will help
let's see what it does set the farmer he
wholeheartedly thought of the snake for
a second and the next second the snake
appeared in front of him he narrated the
whole incident sir please even telephony
I'll go and light the blue snake
I made a Buster but if only you touch
her she looked hard you can also dr.
Leith set the snake as plan the snake
bit the Queen though all the royal
doctors treated they couldn't cure her
at that time
the farmer sent word through the God
that he would cure the Queen the king
called for him he thought of the snake
in his heart and touched the Queen's
feet the Queen got cured the king also
was happy the farmer proved that he was
innocent and made the King punish the
guilty jeweler the King gifted the
farmer with lots of gold and precious
gems
more being ungrateful to the person who
helped the bagger did ever the lobby
